name: Fish vs. Sea
description: In Fish vs. Sea, you are a tiny fish that is lost in the uncharted seas. But your adorable fish has the unbeatable power of ... BUBBLES! Sometimes, your fish can use special powers that no one could imagine. Your fish has gathered bravery and strength through defeating predators which lets you unlock special abilities. But predators will eat you, so beware! Can  you beat all the predators?
